title: rajanI jAta
sahitya:
rajanI jAta himakara pAdayuta mE krta paritApa


anupallavi

  vikaca kamala bhAsuramukhi sumasArakAntam tamiha vinA ratikELi sarasamayi kAntam


caraNam 1    kisalaya maya mati kOmaLamapi sakhi talpam dishati ca mE hrdi tApam avaviratam analpam
    caraNam 2    bahaLa shraNavara malayaja pankamapi sushishiram kalayati mAnasamapi garaLa vadati vidhuram
    caraNam 3    ramaNi sajala tOya parihasa nAbham ramaNamihanaya tarasA sarasijanAbham
